text:
例えば、
強烈な怒りが
変身条件の
モンスターもいる
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 3.99%;top: 1.73%;width: 22.66%;height: 9.04%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
変身は
特定の要素への
記憶や接触、
また発作的に
起こる場合もある
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 46.54%;top: 1.42%;width: 17.66%;height: 13.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
変身は危険性から
最小限に留める
必要がある
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 74.84%;top: 26.65%;width: 20.43%;height: 10.77%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 33.24%;top: 42.14%;width: 7.45%;height: 3.77%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
習得まで
どの位
かかるの?
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 57.29%;top: 41.98%;width: 10.00%;height: 11.01%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 81.97%;top: 43.71%;width: 9.68%;height: 5.42%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 75.90%;top: 51.34%;width: 10.64%;height: 2.99%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
来年、
能力を扱えるか
大きなテストを
受けてもらう
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 76.44%;top: 58.33%;width: 19.15%;height: 11.64%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 42.61%;top: 77.99%;width: 14.79%;height: 5.66%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;
